page.shortlink: UX viewbox properties global events on down hold
page.description: This default event is used when a mouse key is pressed down, and then held in the down position, over an item that has no specific onDownHold event defined

section.description: If an onDownHold event is tied to a specific item's definition, then this localized event will be used in place of the default. The default onDownHold event only fires if an item does NOT contain a onDownHold event in the item definition.
